name: Chrysalis Pyramid
description:
What would be the room scale version of a first person platformer game? We decided to find out and built this wonderful immersive demo.

The game runs on Windows and requires HTC Vive / SteamVR.

The game was made in a weekend during #ViveJamCph.

If you like Chrysalis Pyramid, stay tuned for the spiritual successor Eye of the Temple that's currently in development.
